column1: Uchi////I'm far overdue for a review here. We've been here several times and I've had the majority of the menu items. My favorites are the brussel sprouts
column4: the hot rock and usually the daily specials. The service is always above and beyond here and it makes your meal so much more memorable. We even had a James Harden sighting during our last dinner. The new patio waiting area makes the wait time pass much more quickly. One thing I want to add is that if you aren't drinking
column5: you can definitely have a full meal here for an affordable price. We spend more at Italian restaurants than here when we come and are always surprised our bill comes out to less than a hundred for a nice dinner for two.
